Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World

Alexander T. Schubert & Petra M. Sijpesteijn (edd.), Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 111 (Leiden - Boston, 2014) pp. 249-260.
